'''Nancy''' is [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] and [[Monica Geller|Monica]]'s Realtor. She shows them the house in Westchester that they decide to buy.

When [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] and [[Phoebe Buffay|Phoebe]] see Chandler with her, they think that he is having an affair and follow them to Westchester. Nancy is almost an unseen character. She never looks directly at the camera and her full face is only shown from a distance. She has no lines.

==Trivia==
* Monica states that Nancy does not smoke.
